subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Xander Bogaerts, the 21-year-old shortstop of the Red Sox, tries to follow the example set by his favorite player, Derek Jeter, right down to the new number on his jersey.
snippet: Xander Bogaerts, the 21-year-old shortstop of the Red Sox, tries to follow the example set by his favorite player, Derek Jeter, right down to the new number on his jersey.
